lead_paragraph: Q. Ever since I upgraded my Mac to OS X Yosemite, the Safari browser does not display the full web address of the sites I visit. I like to know the exact page I’m on, so is there a way to extend the abbreviated addresses that are shown at the top of the window?

headline.main: How to See a Full Web Address on the Safari Browser
